content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE LOG_DATA1 
WITH (LOCATION='https://stgdl102.blob.core.windows.net/folder1/userdata1.parquet',
    CREDENTIAL=SasToken)

    CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SasToken 
WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE'
,SECRET='sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2023-05-17T18:47:24Z&st=2023-05-17T10:47:24Z&spr=https&sig=C%2BFd1BdPpbs2Uu5I5AXeGKcMLMR8EmsmLf53%2F%2FMiKGQ%3D'


DROP external  SCOPED CREDENTIAL SasToken
